title: Record Operator Labor
description: An operator needs to record the time they spent working on a specific operation of a work order.

tasks.description: Identify the work order and the specific operation number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly selects the work order and operation they just completed.

tasks.description: Enter the start and end times or the total duration of the work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the time spent on the task.

tasks.description: Submit the labor ticket and verify it has been posted to the work order's cost ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the labor cost has been added to the work order.
